channel.title: [Project Insanity] Where can i change the owner and the npc shops/locations?
channel.description: Ok, i wanna know, how do i set the mods/admins/donators. I wanna change the Owner to myself, not the guy already set, i did it before in my 508 a while back, dont remember how now. I also wanna know, how do i add/change npc shops, where is that located? Also, where is the file for the npcs, like where they spawn etc...

item.title: [Project Insanity] Where can i change the owner and the npc shops/locations?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Well, based on how you worded your question, I’ll assume that you know the name of the “guy” who’s already set as an owner. Simply replace that name with yours?

For adding shops, Google. There are many tutorials, here’s one for instance.

NPC spawns are most likely handled in a configuration file, just look for a folder named config/cfg/configuration/etc.

Read full topic
item.source: [Project Insanity] Where can i change the owner and the npc shops/locations?

item.title: [Project Insanity] Where can i change the owner and the npc shops/locations?
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Just go into the character files and change your player rights.

Read full topic
